Address.Address1: Lagjia 22 Tetori, Shetitorja Osumi, Rajoni Nr.2

Description.Text:
Hotel facilities & services: - Free Wireless Internet - Free Parking - Bar - Restaurant for 100 pax - Traditional cuisine - 24-Hour Front Desk - Internet Point - Lift/Elevator - Room service - Security guard - Luggage storage - Safety box in reception -Gift shop -Laundry service
Room facilities: - Free Wireless Internet - Bathroom - ensuite with shower - Bathroom - ensuite with bath -Rollaway Beds -Air-Conditioned Room -Bed lamp - Balcony -Satellite TV -Hairdryer - Minibar - Desk - Safety box - Complimentary toiletries

Palma Hotel is located in the centre of Berat, by the Osum River, close to the bridge that connects two museum quarters. From one side you can enjoy the spectacular view of Mangalem and Berat Castle over the top, while on the other side you can look at the old quarter Gorica.
